name: Tukijo's Cake
description:
game ini menceritakan tentang seorang ibu yang menitipkan kue kepada anakanya , saat kue di tunggu oleh seorang anak tersebut , kue di di datangi serangga serangga yang mendekat , di situ lah game di mulai

This Game is about a struggles of a young boy named Tukijo, who has been entrusted a Cake by his mother.  His mother told him to protect the Cake by all means. But will it be easy to protect the cake?? while there are many insects which interrupt and attack Tukijo.
This is where the game start.
